LanguageData.Make_10xMedifuel.label: make medifuel x10
LanguageData.Make_10xMedifuel.description:
Mix up medifuel ingredients to produce 10 units at a time.
The 10x bulk production compared to the 1x base recipe, grants : +10% productivity gain -10% ingredient cost.
LanguageData.Make_150xMedifuel.label: make medifuel x150
LanguageData.Make_150xMedifuel.description:
Mix up medifuel ingredients to produce 150 units at a time.
The 150x bulk production compared to the 1x base recipe, grants : +30% productivity gain -20% ingredient cost.
LanguageData.Make_50xMedifuel.label: make medifuel x50
LanguageData.Make_50xMedifuel.description:
Mix up medifuel ingredients to produce 50 units at a time.
The 50x bulk production compared to the 1x base recipe, grants : +20% productivity gain -15% ingredient cost.
